plugin.notActivated: Plugin is not active, yet. Please activate it.
plugin.requiredParameterMissing: The required parameter '%s' could not be found.

usernameScheme.title: Matrix-User naming scheme
usernameScheme.info:
Dieses Schema wird verwendet, um den Matrix-Benutzernamen zu erzeugen,
wenn ILIAS-Benutzer einem Matrix-Chat beitreten wollen, aber bisher keinen Benutzer haben.
Unterst√ºtzte Variablen:
%s

username.title: Username of the Matrix-Server administrator
username.info: Will be used to do administrator tasks like creating rooms.

password.title: Password of the Matrix-Server administrator
password.info:
Will be used to do administrator tasks like creating rooms.
Input-Field will be cleared after saving the password!

initial.title: Initial chat message load limit
initial.info: How many messages should be loaded when the chat is opened (newest x messages)

history.title: Old messages to load
history.info: How many messages to load at the same time when the user scrolls up in the Chat-Window

room.notFoundEvenThoughEnabled:
The room was not found even though the integration is enabled for the course.
It's possible the room was deleted by an external client or the used administrator cannot access it anymore!

The integration probably needs to be deactivated (deleting the room if possible) and then reactivated.
room.memberAssignFailed: User could not be added to the room.

delete.confirm: Would you like to fully delete the associated chat room?

course.enable: Activate Matrix-Chat integration for the Course

register.iliasAuthModeNotSupported: The ILIAS authentication mode '%s' is not supported
